infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Apperture uses the camera to add photos to albums and scan QR codes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Apperture needs access to your photo library to let you add photos to an album.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Apperture needs to access your location to find devices and albums near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Apperture needs to access your location to find devices and albums near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Apperture needs to access your location to find devices and albums near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Apperture needs to access your location to find devices and albums near you.
